alert.note: Alert for Eastern Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 8:14PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Putnam County through 845 PM EDT... At 813 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Orange Mills, or over Hastings. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds up to 45 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Orange Mills and Federal Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
